metadata.name: Service Bus Namespace Topic Subscription
metadata.description: This module deploys a Service Bus Namespace Topic Subscription.
Required. The name of the service bus namespace topic subscription.
Conditional. The name of the parent Service Bus Namespace. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Conditional. The name of the parent Service Bus Namespace Topic. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Optional. ISO 8601 timespan idle interval after which the subscription is automatically deleted. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.
Optional. The properties that are associated with a subscription that is client-affine.
Optional. A value that indicates whether a subscription has dead letter support when a message expires.
Optional. A value that indicates whether a subscription has dead letter support when a message expires.
Optional. ISO 8601 timespan idle interval after which the message expires. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.
Optional. ISO 8601 timespan that defines the duration of the duplicate detection history. The default value is 10 minutes.
Optional. A value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled.
Optional. The name of the recipient entity to which all the messages sent to the subscription are forwarded to.
Optional. The name of the recipient entity to which all the messages sent to the subscription are forwarded to.
Optional. A value that indicates whether the subscription supports the concept of session.

Optional. ISO 8601 timespan duration of a peek-lock; that is, the amount of time that the message is locked for other receivers. The maximum value for LockDuration is 5 minutes; the default value is 1 minute.
Optional. Number of maximum deliveries. A message is automatically deadlettered after this number of deliveries. Default value is 10.
Optional. A value that indicates whether the subscription supports the concept of session.
Optional. Enumerates the possible values for the status of a messaging entity.
